Description:
Assisting users to identify and correct hardware and software problems.
Recovery of old equipment for the purpose of repair or maintenance.
Guiding users in rectifying the required hardware and software queries.
Engage in the effective rollout process of the company's product or service launch.Skills
Skills:
Skilled in remotely installing, upgrading, troubleshooting, and repairing (at the component level) any of the personal computers.
Expert in the installation of client software and operating systems as per requirement.
Proficient in catering to IT software installation and fault finding as per demand.
Proven track record of fixing bugs and errors on various smartphone operating systems.
